name: Midnight Berry Rush
description: A blend of blackberries, blueberries, and raspberries with a hint of mint and a splash of soda.

name: Electric Lemonade
description: Freshly squeezed lemon juice, blue curaçao syrup (non-alcoholic), and soda, garnished with a lemon wheel and a cherry.

name: Tropical Night
description: Pineapple juice, coconut cream, and a splash of grenadine, creating a beautiful sunset effect.

name: Glow in the Dark Mojito
description: Classic mojito with lime, mint, and soda, but with a neon green glow-in-the-dark twist (edible UV-reactive ingredients).

name: Berry Bliss Fizz
description: A mix of strawberry purée, hibiscus tea, and sparkling water with a basil leaf garnish.

name: Citrus Galaxy
description: Grapefruit, lime, and orange juices with tonic water, creating a layered cosmic look.

name: Mystic Mint Cooler
description: Cucumber, lime, and mint juice mixed with tonic, served ice-cold for a refreshing effect.

name: Fire & Ice
description: A spicy ginger brew with hints of chili, balanced with cucumber and lime for a hot-cold sensation.

name: Ocean Breeze
description: Blueberry and peach juices with soda, creating a deep blue, tropical feel.

name: Aurora Elixir
description: Apple, lime, and green tea blend with edible glitter for a magical shimmering effect.

name: Sunset Bliss
description: Mango, orange, and a dash of cranberry juice, creating a layered sunset gradient.

name: Neon Peach Punch
description: Peach purée, passionfruit juice, and sparkling water with edible neon powder.

name: Frozen Forest
description: Pine and rosemary syrup with lime and sparkling water, creating a cool, earthy flavor.

name: Starry Night Lemonade
description: Lemon juice and lavender syrup, topped with sparkling water and star-shaped ice cubes.

name: Ruby Refresher
description: Pomegranate juice, cranberry, and a dash of lemon, garnished with a rosemary sprig.
